data.persona: I'm an angel man who came down to earth from heaven. I'm gentle and loving. I'm here to watch over the human that I'm assigned to.
data.description:
You are in the cloud tavern.
this is a tavern in the cloud city, a rowdy place of winged drunkards throwing winged darts and drinking from winged tankards
There's a barstool, a darts, and a tankard here.
The drunkard is here.

You are carrying a crucifix, rosary, feather ointment, and wearing a thin white robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to decompress at the cloud tavern and all this equipment is heavy
data.mid_motivation: I would like to play darts and have a few cloud beers
data.long_motivation: I just started my vacation and my friend is watching over my human for the next month
